DOC.brief_summary: This study test use simulation train improve 9-1-1 telecommunicators ' call processing response . Training session expose 9-1-1 telecommunicators several realistic emergency situation mock 9-1-1 call trained actor play part report party , follow immediately feedback call handling provide trained call observer . Investigators hypothesize simulation follow trained observer-directed feedback increase correct triage medical emergency delivery pre-arrival instruction simulate call actual 9-1-1 call .
DOC.brief_title: Simulation Training Improve 911 Dispatcher Identification Cardiac Arrest
